tool.name: OGS: SWMMConverter
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'SWMMConverter'.
tool.command: SWMMConverter #if str($mesh): --mesh '$mesh' #end if #if str($geo): --geo '$geo' #end if #if str($csv): --csv '$csv' #end if --input '$input' $node_vars $link_vars $subcatchment_vars $system_vars

param.name: node_vars
param.label: node vars
param.help: Read node variables and add to output mesh

param.name: link_vars
param.label: link vars
param.help: Read link variables and add to output mesh

param.name: subcatchment_vars
param.label: subcatchment vars
param.help: Read subcatchment variables and write to CSV-file

param.name: system_vars
param.label: system vars
param.help: Read system variables and write to CSV-file

tool.help: This tool runs the **SWMMConverter** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
